attributes.action: Jacob Rees Mogg needs to resign.
attributes.background: Jacob Rees Mogg has to be made aware that whatever the 2016 referendum result, the mood of this country and economy have suffered whilst effects of austerity bypassed. His actions indicate that he does not care about the time wasted while he disrupts negotiations. He needs to go.

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
